item.string: Affectionately known as Club AOK, the UMBC library features 7 floors of books and resources. The Retriever Learning Center (RLC) on the first floor is accessable to anyone with a red student ID 24 hours a day.\n\n To learn more about the AOK library, visit https://www.umbc.edu/aok/main/index.html
The Retriever Athletic Center, or "The RAC", is UMBC\'s very own gym. Features include an indoor pool, an outdoor pool, a full sized basketball court, and the newly renovated weight room.

True Grit\s Dining Hall is a buffet style, all you can eat, dining facility. With a salad bar, a vegan section, and the Kosher Korner, students will find their favorite foods at True Grit\'s!\n\n For more information on True Grit\'s, and other UMBC dining facilities visit http://www.umbc.edu/reslife/living/dining_facilities.html
